selectMultipleImages: You can select multiple images at once
uploadImage: Drag or click on the left area to upload images
djmaxRespectV: DJMAX RESPECT V supports Freestyle song selection, Freestyle results, Open Match song selection, Open Match results, and Ladder/Versus match results screens.
platinaLab: PLATINA LAB supports Single play results screen.
needLogin: Score registration requires login or account linking with the corresponding service.
convertImageError: An error occurred while converting the image. Please select another image of the same score.
ocrError: An error occurred during OCR processing. Please select another image of the same score.
ocrErrorMultiple: An error occurred during OCR processing for some images. Processing will continue for the remaining images if any exist.
